description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾连任七届立法委员。因在立委任内诈领助理费而被以贪污罪起诉，后潜逃并被通缉。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served seven consecutive terms as a legislator. He was indicted for corruption for fraudulently claiming assistant fees during his tenure and later became a fugitive.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长，是李庆华与李庆安的父亲。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Premier. He is the father of Lee Ching-hua and Lee Ching-an.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国新闻工作者与政治人物，李焕之女，李庆华之妹。
description.en: A journalist and politician of the Republic of China, daughter of Lee Huan and sister of Lee Ching-hua.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的国立大学。
description.en: A national university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党，由一群前中国国民党成员于1993年创立。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China, founded in 1993 by a group of former Kuomintang members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党，由宋楚瑜于2000年创立。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China, founded by James Soong in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法院的成员，为该国的国会议员。
description.en: A member of the Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China, serving as a national parliamentarian.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，时代力量党员，在2016年立法委员选举中击败李庆华。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a member of the New Power Party, who defeated Lee Ching-hua in the 2016 legislative election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，新党的共同创始人之一。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, one of the co-founders of the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，新党的共同创始人之一。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, one of the co-founders of the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，亲民党的创始人与党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, founder and chairman of the People First Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾在国民党立委初选中击败李庆华。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who defeated Lee Ching-hua in a KMT legislative primary.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾在立法院与李庆华发生冲突。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who had a conflict with Lee Ching-hua in the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾在选举中挑战李庆华，并曾殴打其妹李庆安。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who challenged Lee Ching-hua in an election and had previously assaulted his sister, Lee Ching-an.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的地方法院之一。
description.en: One of the district courts of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指公职人员利用职务之便非法获取财物的罪行。
description.en: The crime of public officials illegally obtaining property through the convenience of their position.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国体育官员，曾任中国奥林匹克委员会主席。
description.en: A sports official of the People's Republic of China who served as the chairman of the Chinese Olympic Committee.

description.zh-cn: 代表中华民国（台湾）的国家奥林匹克委员会。
description.en: The National Olympic Committee representing the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾与李庆华一同退出亲民党。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who left the People First Party along with Lee Ching-hua.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任副总统及中国国民党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Vice President and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的非政府环保组织。
description.en: A non-governmental environmental organization in Taiwan.

en: Civil Servants Election and Recall Act

description.zh-cn: 中华民国关于公职人员选举与罢免的法律。
description.en: The law concerning the election and recall of public officials in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李庆华是前行政院院长李焕之子。
description.en: Lee Ching-hua is the son of former Premier Lee Huan.

description.zh-cn: 李庆华是李庆安的哥哥。
description.en: Lee Ching-hua is the brother of Lee Ching-an.

description.zh-cn: 与赵少康、郁慕明等人共同脱离国民党创立新党。
description.en: Co-founded the New Party with Jaw Shaw-kong and Yok Mu-ming after leaving the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 在2016年立法委员选举中击败李庆华，使其无缘八连霸，结束其23年的立委生涯。
description.en: Defeated Lee Ching-hua in the 2016 legislative election, preventing him from securing an eighth term and ending his 23-year career as a legislator.

description.zh-cn: 在2000年总统选举前夕退出新党，转而支持亲民党候选人宋楚瑜。
description.en: Left the New Party before the 2000 presidential election to support People First Party candidate James Soong.

description.zh-cn: 在国民党立委初选中败给张庆忠后，公开批评张庆忠买人头党员作弊、贿选。
description.en: After losing to Chang Ching-chung in a KMT legislative primary, he publicly criticized Chang for cheating and vote-buying through bogus party members.

description.zh-cn: 在立法院与邱议莹发生冲突，李庆华骂其为泼妇，邱议莹则回赏巴掌。
description.en: Had a conflict with Chiu Yi-ying in the Legislative Yuan, where Lee called her a shrew and Chiu slapped him in response.

description.zh-cn: 作为强势挑战者参选2012年立法委员选举，与李庆华竞争。罗福助曾于立法院殴打李庆华的妹妹李庆安。
description.en: Competed against Lee Ching-hua as a strong challenger in the 2012 legislative election. Lo Fu-chu had previously assaulted Lee's sister, Lee Ching-an, in the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 因李庆华在贪污案中两次传唤未到庭，新北地方法院对其发布通缉。
description.en: The New Taipei District Court issued an arrest warrant for Lee Ching-hua after he failed to appear in court twice for his corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 李庆华因被以贪污罪起诉，其政治生涯终结并成为通缉犯。
description.en: Lee Ching-hua's political career ended and he became a fugitive after being indicted on corruption charges.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国奥委会主席何振梁与时任中华奥委会秘书长李庆华签署协议，确定了“中华台北”的称谓。
description.en: Then-Chairman of the Chinese Olympic Committee He Zhenliang and then-Secretary-General of the Chinese Taipei Olympic Committee Lee Ching-hua signed an agreement confirming the use of the name 'Chinese Taipei'.

description.zh-cn: 因不满党主席宋楚瑜与时任总统陈水扁会面，与邱毅共同退出亲民党。
description.en: Left the People First Party together with Chiu Yi due to dissatisfaction with party chairman James Soong's meeting with then-president Chen Shui-bian.

description.zh-cn: 在2017年中国国民党主席选举中，表态支持吴敦义。
description.en: Expressed support for Wu Den-yih in the 2017 Kuomintang chairmanship election.

description.zh-cn: 发动罢免李庆华的行动。
description.en: Initiated a movement to recall Lee Ching-hua.

description.zh-cn: 与其他五位立法委员共同提出修正草案，旨在提高罢免门槛。
description.en: Co-proposed an amendment with five other legislators to raise the threshold for recalls.
